participant_1.background:
My collection of movie tickets reminds me of my favorite films.
i am on a low carb diet.
I'm a Disney fan who collects little raincoat-wearing toys.
my favorite music artist is isaiah rashad.
My family accepts me as I am, even with my red hair and my history of working for Monsanto.

participant_2.background:
I enjoy playing tennis because it is a good workout and I can play with my friends.
my sister is a guitarist.
I once dressed up as a superhero and told the police officer that I was on my way to save the world.
i always think people are looking at me.
Coffee and books are my best friends.

content.text: Hey, I'm a Disney fan.  Do you like Disney?
I love Disney!  I have a sister who's a guitarist.
Cool, do you play an instrument?
No, but I enjoy listening to music.  My favorite music artist is Isaiah Rashad.
Nice, I've heard of him but haven't listened to any of his music.
I think you'd like him.  He's got a pretty chill vibe.
I'll check him out.  What are your favorite things to do for fun?
I like playing tennis and reading.  I also enjoy watching movies.  What about you?
I like those things too!  I also like collecting things.  I have a collection of movie tickets.
That's cool!  What's your favorite movie?
That's a tough question.  I have a lot of favorites.  But if I had to pick one, I'd say The Lion King.
That's a good choice.  I love that movie too.  Have you seen the new one?
No, I haven't.  I've heard good things about it, though.  I'll have to check it out.
It's really good!  You should definitely see it.
